casebody.data:
No. 11-386. The Bronx Household of Faith, et al., Petitioners v. New York City Board of Education, et al. 565 U.S. 1087, 132 S. Ct. 816,

181 L. Ed. 2d 541,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 8822. December 5, 2011.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Second Circuit denied.

Justice Sotomayor took no part in the consideration or decision of this petition.

Same case below, 650 F.3d 30.
